name: Magic Wand (itch) (ImagineGerman)
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

Shoot green bottles to get points.

Don't shoot red bottles.

Don't let green bottles touch the ground.

CONTROLS: 

LEFT CLICK =  SHOOT

CREDITS:

Game Engine: Unity

Music: https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/ 

Sound Effects: https://sfxr.me/

Bottle Sprites: Freepick
